sentence.Network_en: The level of expertise and helpfulness is far higher in smaller shops.
sentence.Network_cn: 规模较小的商店专业得多，对顾客也体贴得多。

sentence.Network_en: They parted on a high plane of amity and Christian helpfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在十分友好、洋溢着基督教徒助人为乐精神的气氛中分了手.

sentence.Network_en: The high - water mark of India's helpfulness, such as it was, is passing.
sentence.Network_cn: 印度的获助高潮已然逝去.

entry.def: If you describe someone as helpful, you mean that they help you in some way, such as doing part of your job for you or by giving you advice or information.

example.ex: The staff in the London office are helpful but only have limited information...
example.tran: 伦敦办事处的工作人员给予了帮助，但他们掌握的信息有限。

example.ex: James is a very helpful and cooperative lad...
example.tran: 詹姆斯是个肯帮忙、好合作的小伙子。

entry.tran: （信息、建议等）有帮助的，有用的
entry.def: If you describe information or advice as helpful, you mean that it is useful for you.

example.ex: The catalog includes helpful information on the different bike models available...
example.tran: 目录中包括了在售的各种型号自行车的有用信息。

example.ex: The following information may be helpful to readers.
example.tran: 下列信息可能对读者有用。

entry.tran: (事物）有助于改善局面的，有好处的
entry.def: Something that is helpful makes a situation more pleasant or more easy to tolerate.

example.ex: A predominantly liquid diet for a day or two may be helpful...
example.tran: 一两天里主要吃流质食物可能会有好处。

example.ex: It is often helpful to have your spouse in the room when major news is expected...
example.tran: 等待重大消息时最好有配偶在场。

means.word_mean: 1. the property of providing useful assistance
2. friendliness evidence by a kindly and helpful disposition

auth_sentence.content: But all her helpfulness came at a price.
auth_sentence.res_content: But all her helpfulness came at a price.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But all her helpfulness came at a price.

auth_sentence.content: This is the remarkable charm and helpfulness of the Japanese.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is the remarkable charm and helpfulness of the Japanese.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is the remarkable charm and helpfulness of the Japanese.

auth_sentence.content: Their friendliness, kindness and helpfulness made everything so much easier and just added to the great atmosphere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their friendliness, kindness and helpfulness made everything so much easier and just added to the great atmosphere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their friendliness, kindness and helpfulness made everything so much easier and just added to the great atmosphere.
